Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a room in a hotel.

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(LocalDate date)
      Checks if the room is available on a specified date. If room has no reservations on said date, then it is available.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check
      Returns:
      true if the room is available, false otherwise
